con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:con="http://controller.bottomup.eri.com/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <con:addMovie>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <arg0>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <categories>adventure</categories>\r <categories>drama</categories> <categories>sci-fi</categories>
<!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <directors>\r <name>Cristopher</name>\r <surname>Nolan</surname>\r </directors>\r <id>12</id>\r <stars>\r <name>Matthew</name>\r <surname>McConaughey</surname>\r </stars>\r <stars> <name> Anne</name> <surname> Hathaway</surname> </stars> <stars> <name>Timothée</name> <surname>Chalamet</surname> </stars> <title>Interstellar</title>\r </arg0>\r </con:addMovie>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
